title: Bard and Kindred Fanart!

embed.description: I haven't drawn LoL fanart in a while and man I really dig the new champion's design so I had to draw them with my main-- to be honest I think they'd get along well 8)) Also I'm sorry this picture ...

body:
ayy guess who finally learned how to use these forums? 
its me.. _(:3 」∠)_
But I made some Kindred fan art the other day and thought I could share it here! ^ ^ 
I could see them getting along with Bard quite well! (except I imagine that Wolf may hassle him pls dont pop the balloon)

and I love both of their designs so much ; - ; so I thought I could challenge myself a bit and create a scenic picture! You guys are welcome to use this as your wallpaper or icons for whatever heh 

EDIT: apparently Bard is actually much bigger than Kindred! orz i kinda failed with the size difference there-- maybe Kindred took an {{item:2138}} or got {{champion:117}} ulted? <:3c
